name: Freshpak LMX Series
description: Freshpak LMX Series is an extreme low migration series developed specifically for the most demanding indirect food contact folding carton applications. This specialty conventional ink system is drier-free, sets quickly, and is an extremely low odor/low voc product line. Freshpak lmx is formulated following the eupia exclusion list, guideline on printing inks, and gmp for packaging inks. Freshpak lmx inks are vegetable based, formulated without mineral oil, and are based on renewable bio-based materials.
